# es_retain_message(_:)

**Function**

Retains the given message, extending its lifetime until released.

## Declaration

```swift
func es_retain_message(_ msg: UnsafePointer<es_message_t>)
```

## Parameters

- **msg**: The message to retain.

## Discussion

If you asynchronously process the message provided to the event-handler block of [doc://com.apple.endpointsecurity/documentation/EndpointSecurity/es_new_client(_:_:)], you must retain the message.

## Retaining and Releasing Messages

- **es_release_message(_:)**: Releases a previously-retained message.
